CodeDeliveryFailureException: Invalid email provided / Unable to send the email
CodeMismatchException: Invalid verification code provided, please try again
LimitExceededException: Attempt limit exceeded, please try after some time
PasswordResetRequiredException: A password reset is required to log in
TooManyFailedAttemptsException: Too many requests, try again later
TooManyRequestsException: Too many requests, try again later
UsernameExistsException: Email address already exists for a user. Try to log in or sign up with a different email address
googleAuthenticatorDownload: You will need to download the Google Authenticator App on your smartphone from the
scanQrCode: In the Authenticator app, scan this QR code
enter2fa6DigitCode: Enter the 6 digit code generated from the Authenticator App
enterMfaCode: Enter a 6 digit code from your authenticator app
copyVerificationCode: Or copy the code below in your authenticator app
